review.title: “Good for starting”
review.pros: Pros – You get a lot of experience
review.cons: Cons – You can't continue with your career, you can't advance, you have to stay on the same position.

review.title: “Tecnocom”
review.pros: Pros – There are some colleagues who help to you every day. The Madrid office is near of bus and underground station.
review.cons: Cons – No mentoring, No managers help in your career and always work more time without retribution or any compensation.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “A Company that need good people to join and help to success”
review.pros: Pros – Good team lot of capable people, and stable job
review.cons: Cons – In the process to have a common culture, the are differences in people that come from different adquisitions.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to improve some management, that are not ready for the future strategy

review.title: “Big company, normal issues”
review.pros: Pros – Big company that offers a lot of oportunities of working abroad.
review.cons: Cons – Quality of the product developed is not too good.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Tecnocom is a big company, but has a good things from small companies.”
review.pros: Pros – - Formation, you have online platforms for learning.- In my case, i have good co-workers and managers.
review.cons: Cons – - Maybe salary could be better.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Acceptable”
review.pros: Pros – Great opportunities to learn and great people working there
review.cons: Cons – No common cultureHR is a disaster
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Resource management is quite poor and the organization is like a burocracy. A more agile organization can lead to much more productive company
